content: I don't have personal preferences or emotions, but i can provide you with some examples of maya angelou's most famous poems that have had a powerful impact on readers across the world. one of her most beloved works is "still i rise," which celebrates resilience in the face of adversity and has become an anthem for many people who have suffered discrimination or hardship. "phenomenal woman" is another famous poem, which explores the beauty and strength of women and their indomitable spirit. other notable maya angelou poems include "i know why the caged bird sings," "on the pulse of morning," and "touched by an angel."
